Text: ValeroPecos PointThe ValeroPecos point is available now but not as a bidirectional point We can only flow from Transwestern to Valero at this time until El Paso decides what they want to do with the other run kb
Valve at Coronado PecosThe positive shut off valve has been repaired at the Coronado Pecos point The valve no longer requires manual shut in
El Paso MaintenanceEl Paso will be performing maintenance on their pipeline east of flagstaff close to the navajo reservation between and the morning of Jan Parties effected have been notified

Westar CarsonI received a high hs alarm at the Westar Carson point and had Joe Martinez to check it out The point is not flowing at this time but he did say that we can ignore this alarm in the future because it is a default reading He will talk to some people soon and get this removed My understanding is that it used to be a split signal there that would measure the hs at the kb and westar But now its just one signal monitor there that measures the kb and its set up on min increments After it gives you an hs reading on the kb it automatically switches to westar and gives you a reading there

Excavation startup at KingmanThe excavation has started at the red rock tiein point at Station Kingman for the new compressor Depending on flows out west we need to try and hold the suction pressure at station under with a differential no greater than lbs Plant personnel and Gas Control will be monitoring the pressure during the day hours After hours until pm and on Weekends Gas Control will need to contact Larry Meeks who is the contractor on site and his number is

TW PipelineHi Shelley Through these stressful times of people moving around and the company restructuring and splitting out the pipelines I strongly recommend that Darrell Schoolcraft remain with the TW pipeline group as managerdirector of this pipeline group He is very knowledgeable and very professional in his duties as a coordinator and certainly would make an excellent managerdirector under any new restructuring plan Hes also been very helpful to me and others in maintaining a solid pipeline as well as keeping the lines of communication open between ourselves and our customers Shelley for whatever this is worth he comes strongly recommended for this positon under any type of restructuring plan Thanks kb
